creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
dimension: 14 × 18 7/8 in. (35.6 × 48 cm) (image, sheet, vertical ōban diptych)
inscription: Right: {Ichimuta}; left: {Kawarasaki} (his role name is illegible)

medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
title: Ichimura Kakitsu I as Chōkichi, Kawarasaki Gonjūrō I as a Gallant
